titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 311, H. Con. Res. 194 is considered passed House.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 311.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/9/1997--Introduced. Provides for a joint session of Congress on January 27, 1998, to receive a message from the President.
